meanings.definition: A compound containing one atom of oxygen combined with two atoms of another element.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the protoxide in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The protoxide is an important part of the chemical reaction.
meanings.sent3: The protoxide decided to go for a walk in the park.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like a protoxide, combining two hearts into one.
meanings.sent5: The protoxide glowed brightly under the microscope.

meanings.definition: A chemical compound in which oxygen has a valence of two.
meanings.sent1: The protoxide was used in the experiment to create a reaction.
meanings.sent2: She added the protoxide to the mixture to balance the equation.
meanings.sent3: The protoxide made a funny sound when it bubbled in the beaker.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a protoxide, bonding their friendship even stronger.
meanings.sent5: The protoxide's color changed when exposed to heat.
